name: Caves of Gold
description:
A loosely Spelunky-inspired game in the Nokia 3310 style!

Collect coins!
Blow stuff up!
Drive responsibly!

Collect as many coins as you can before the timer runs out. Some coins are unreachable? Don't worry, you can be a staple of society and blow up million year caves! If you get stuck, just fly up to the surface and continue exploring just like in real life!

WASD
movement (you can double jump!)
E
drop a bomb
Qreturn to the platform and replenish bombs
Mcheck your map

(It can take a while to generate the caves, if it appears frozen, please wait a few seconds)
